title: Swedish or Danish currency paying tribute to type designers?
content: I recall seeing a blog post way back about the Swedish or Danish currency featuring different type designers and have been unable to find that source since, does anyone else know more about this?
author: oneweioranother

comments.content: [A new series of five stamps have recently been issued in Sweden, each portraying one influencial Swedish typeface to reflect the local typographic history.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307113647/http:/fontsinuse.com/uses/1586/typographic-swedish-stamps)

Satura gets me all hot and bothered. In fact it's the main reason I'm still pissed that Stephen didn't do a Typographica "best of" for 2010. :-) So what about a "best of" for the first decade of 2K?

hhp
